answerText: tensors[10] Tensor contraction can be seen as a generalization of this matrix operation, in which all of the diagonal elements of a matrix are added together.
heading: Penn Bowl |2014 | 9 | 17 | Science | Math | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Cauchy names a second-order one of these that is used to describe three-dimensional stresses. For 10 points each: [10] Name these mathematical entities whose order is the dimensionality of the array required to represent them. Their scalar components are indicated by subscripts and superscripts, and contraction reduces their order by 2.
